response.original_title: Our Voices: the Sounds of the Silenced
response.overview: Black women have a painful history of being overlooked, marginalized, and silenced. Our Voices: the Sounds of the Silenced features thought-provoking perspectives from talented Black women who, through pain, are motivated to use their gifts as a voice to protest injustices. Their call to action fosters a nation that is more loving, kind, and just. In order to transform communities for the greater good and well-being of all, it is imperative to plot a new path forward by listening to the Sounds of the Silenced.
response.title: Our Voices: the Sounds of the Silenced
